name: Learn Chinese - 6000 Essential Words
description: Learn Chinese - 6000 Essential Words is one of Poros apps to help you build up your Chinese Vocabulary quickly by using the most effective way - Visual memory technique. Chinese Vocabulary app is perfect for Beginner, Pre-Intermediate , Intermediate and Upper-Intermediate levels with 6000+ words with pictures and pronunciations of native speakers. 10 main topics divided into 145 subtopics with a wide range of words will enrich your vocabulary significantly.  Start with basic words and topics, and Learn new words daily! Review learned words and topics with flashcard, test and listening tasks features and also challenge yourself by playing POROs interesting games!  Also, to some who curious about China, we give you a whole topic with essential words about China from Chinese cusine, culture, history to their attractionvery useful to the one who first come to China.   Main Features  Detailed vocabulary - 6000+ words with visual pictures and pronunciations of native speaker to build your Vocabulary skills - 10 essential topics divided into 145 subtopics with a wide range of words will enrich your vocabulary significantly   Flashcard study - Built-in effective flashcard review system to help you learn and test your memory of new words - The visibility of image and reading associated meanings. - Many option to choose speed of swipe flashcard to test your remembering of words    Practice test - Customize questions to test your remembering of words, way of reading, meanings  - Customized repeat wrong answers to help you remember it. - Review in the end of test showed you which words have you remembered.   Game challenges  Choosing the right image for the correct pronunciation within a limited time, PORO memory training games will help you train the ability to reflex when learning a new word effectively.  ** Poro - Chinese vocabulary * suitable for: - Chinese vocabulary learner from Beginner, Pre-Intermediate , Intermediate and Upper-Intermediate levels. - Is preparing to practice Chinese HSK3, HSK4, HSK5. - Love Chinese culture. - Anyone interested in Chinese letters - Like to challenge your level  Poro - Chinese vocabulary is in developing process; we hope to receive your contribution comment to make it better. We are just a team that love Chinese and try to share our love to community, so if you like this app then please take a moment to rate it. You can also get in touch with comments or suggestions via the feedback button on the Options Screen.  Please kindly contact: - Email: nihongo.appsdev@gmail.com  Thank you very much and Good luck!
